column1: Smoque BBQ////This time I got a 1/2 slab of St. Louis and the pulled pork. They had a special thing for Smoque Chili
column2: so I subbed that for the beans. Now that I actually have something to compare the pulled pork to
column3: I can safely say that Smoque's pulled pork is bad. It's try and tasteless. It's so bad that the mediocre BBQ sauce actually helps it a lot
column4: but the texture doesn't change and it's just disappointing. Feels like sawdust
column5: your mouth gets dryer eating it. With every bite I compared it to Nashville Airport's and it paled in every regard. Funny
column6: because this is what people say to try when you go.
